charges.charge_description: 21:841(a) POSSESSION OF 50 KILOGRAMS OR MORE OF MARIJUANA, A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE (INDICTMENT FILE 4/22/93) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: $100.00 special assessment on counts 1 &; 3; 12 mths imprisonment on count 1 and 5 years on count 3 to be served consec; 3 years supervised release on both counts to run conc with each other with standard conditions of supervision and additional conditions (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) USE AND CARRY OF A FIREARM DURING AND IN RELATION TO A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME (INDICTMENT FILED 4/22/93) (3)

charges.charge_disposition: $100.00 special assessment on counts 1 &; 3; 12 mths imprisonment on count 1 and 5 years on count 3 to be served consec; 3 years supervised release on both counts to run conc with each other with standard conditions of supervision and additional conditions (3)
